--- title: 2025-04-01 --- ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(here) library(lme4) library(tidyverse) library(effects) library(ggeffects) library(sjPlot) library(lattice) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} # loading data dat <- readRDS(here("data/emoint.rds")) dat <- filter(dat, emotion_lbl != "neutral") ``` ::: Single-subject model: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} fit <- glm(acc ~ intensity * emotion_lbl, data = dat, subset = id == 1, family = binomial(link = "logit")) # model without the interaction fit0 <- glm(acc ~ intensity + emotion_lbl, data = dat, subset = id == 1, family = binomial(link = "logit")) summary(fit) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Call: glm(formula = acc ~ intensity * emotion_lbl, family = binomial(link = "logit"), data = dat, subset = id == 1) Coefficients: Estimate Std. Error z value Pr(>|z|) (Intercept) -2.598651 1.347156 -1.929 0.0537 . intensity 0.095568 0.038859 2.459 0.0139 * emotion_lbldisgust -0.618369 1.514043 -0.408 0.6830 emotion_lblfear 0.429429 1.603165 0.268 0.7888 emotion_lblhappiness -0.275018 1.600348 -0.172 0.8636 emotion_lblsadness -0.556507 1.737147 -0.320 0.7487 emotion_lblsuprise 2.267763 1.513293 1.499 0.1340 intensity:emotion_lbldisgust -0.024760 0.041089 -0.603 0.5468 intensity:emotion_lblfear -0.048318 0.041881 -1.154 0.2486 intensity:emotion_lblhappiness -0.007585 0.044519 -0.170 0.8647 intensity:emotion_lblsadness 0.018227 0.051148 0.356 0.7216 intensity:emotion_lblsuprise -0.044934 0.042913 -1.047 0.2951 --- Signif. codes: 0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1 (Dispersion parameter for binomial family taken to be 1) Null deviance: 448.60 on 369 degrees of freedom Residual deviance: 265.38 on 358 degrees of freedom AIC: 289.38 Number of Fisher Scoring iterations: 7 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} summary(fit0) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Call: glm(formula = acc ~ intensity + emotion_lbl, family = binomial(link = "logit"), data = dat, subset = id == 1) Coefficients: Estimate Std. Error z value Pr(>|z|) (Intercept) -1.824e+00 6.024e-01 -3.028 0.00246 ** intensity 7.148e-02 7.860e-03 9.094 < 2e-16 *** emotion_lbldisgust -1.425e+00 6.182e-01 -2.304 0.02121 * emotion_lblfear -1.539e+00 7.060e-01 -2.180 0.02926 * emotion_lblhappiness -4.451e-01 6.421e-01 -0.693 0.48818 emotion_lblsadness -2.137e-15 6.637e-01 0.000 1.00000 emotion_lblsuprise 8.825e-01 6.746e-01 1.308 0.19082 --- Signif. codes: 0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1 (Dispersion parameter for binomial family taken to be 1) Null deviance: 448.60 on 369 degrees of freedom Residual deviance: 271.84 on 363 degrees of freedom AIC: 285.84 Number of Fisher Scoring iterations: 6 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} # evaluating the single effects car::Anova(fit) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Analysis of Deviance Table (Type II tests) Response: acc LR Chisq Df Pr(>Chisq) intensity 157.042 1 < 2.2e-16 *** emotion_lbl 31.677 5 6.884e-06 *** intensity:emotion_lbl 6.462 5 0.2638 --- Signif. codes: 0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} anova(fit, fit0) # same as car::Anova() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Analysis of Deviance Table Model 1: acc ~ intensity * emotion_lbl Model 2: acc ~ intensity + emotion_lbl Resid. Df Resid. Dev Df Deviance Pr(>Chi) 1 358 265.38 2 363 271.84 -5 -6.4619 0.2638 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} # plotting the effects plot(allEffects(fit)) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](2025-04-01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672} ::: ```{.r .cell-code} plot(ggeffect(fit, terms = c("intensity", "emotion_lbl"))) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} 0.89917783 0.9993092 suprise ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} dd <- expand.grid( emotion_lbl = unique(dat$emotion_lbl), intensity = unique(dat$intensity) ) #predict(fit, newdata = dd, type = "response", se.fit = TRUE) # creating table tab_model(fit) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}

````` ::: ::: Fit a model for each subject and plot the coefficients. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} fit_res <- function(fit){ cc <- summary(fit)$coefficients cc <- data.frame(cc) ci <- data.frame(confint(fit)) names(ci) <- c("lower", "upper") names(cc) <- c("b", "se", "z", "p") out <- cbind(cc, ci) out$param <- rownames(out) rownames(out) <- NULL return(out) } fit_fun <- function(data){ glm(acc ~ intensity, family = binomial(link = "logit"), data = data) } fit_glm_res <- function(data){ fit <- fit_fun(data) fit_res(fit) } dat |> group_by(id) |> nest() |> mutate(res = lapply(data, fit_glm_res)) |> unnest(res) |> ggplot(aes(x = id, y = b, ymin = lower, ymax = upper)) + geom_pointrange() + facet_wrap(~param, scales = "free") ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](2025-04-01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} # centering on the minimum and rescaling to 0-10 dat$intensity0 <- (dat$intensity/10) - 1 fit0 <- glmer(acc ~ intensity0 + (1|id), data = dat, family = binomial(link = "logit")) fit <- glmer(acc ~ intensity0 + (intensity0|id), data = dat, family = binomial(link = "logit")) car::compareCoefs(fit0, fit, zvals = TRUE) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Calls: 1: glmer(formula = acc ~ intensity0 + (1 | id), data = dat, family = binomial(link = "logit")) 2: glmer(formula = acc ~ intensity0 + (intensity0 | id), data = dat, family = binomial(link = "logit")) Model 1 Model 2 (Intercept) -1.0760 -1.0935 SE 0.0457 0.0406 z -23.6 -26.9 intensity0 0.32508 0.33490 SE 0.00524 0.01148 z 62.0 29.2 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} dotplot(ranef(fit)) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` $id ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](2025-04-01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=672} ::: ```{.r .cell-code} # histograms of acc when intensity is 0 hist(plogis(fixef(fit)[1] + ranef(fit)$id[[1]])) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](2025-04-01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-2.png){width=672} ::: ```{.r .cell-code} summary(fit) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Generalized linear mixed model fit by maximum likelihood (Laplace Approximation) [glmerMod] Family: binomial ( logit ) Formula: acc ~ intensity0 + (intensity0 | id) Data: dat AIC BIC logLik -2*log(L) df.resid 30742.3 30783.2 -15366.2 30732.3 26265 Scaled residuals: Min 1Q Median 3Q Max -6.2930 -0.7394 0.3993 0.7623 2.1703 Random effects: Groups Name Variance Std.Dev. Corr id (Intercept) 0.069921 0.26443 intensity0 0.007283 0.08534 -0.43 Number of obs: 26270, groups: id, 71 Fixed effects: Estimate Std. Error z value Pr(>|z|) (Intercept) -1.09350 0.04058 -26.95 <2e-16 *** intensity0 0.33490 0.01148 29.17 <2e-16 *** --- Signif. codes: 0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1 Correlation of Fixed Effects: (Intr) intensity0 -0.545 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} # independent slopes and intercepts fit2 <- glmer(acc ~ intensity0 + (intensity0|id), data = dat, family = binomial(link = "logit")) summary(fit2) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Generalized linear mixed model fit by maximum likelihood (Laplace Approximation) [glmerMod] Family: binomial ( logit ) Formula: acc ~ intensity0 + (intensity0 | id) Data: dat AIC BIC logLik -2*log(L) df.resid 30742.3 30783.2 -15366.2 30732.3 26265 Scaled residuals: Min 1Q Median 3Q Max -6.2930 -0.7394 0.3993 0.7623 2.1703 Random effects: Groups Name Variance Std.Dev. Corr id (Intercept) 0.069921 0.26443 intensity0 0.007283 0.08534 -0.43 Number of obs: 26270, groups: id, 71 Fixed effects: Estimate Std. Error z value Pr(>|z|) (Intercept) -1.09350 0.04058 -26.95 <2e-16 *** intensity0 0.33490 0.01148 29.17 <2e-16 *** --- Signif. codes: 0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1 Correlation of Fixed Effects: (Intr) intensity0 -0.545 ``` ::: :::
